item.title: Use cat command to add text to file quickly
item.description: Using echo touch file.md echo "hello" > file.md Using cat and standard redirect symbol > cat >> file.md This command creates an empty yet edited file as it prompts the user to create a text file and type in the file at the same time. If you don’t want to edit the file, simply press CTRL+C and it will simply exit and create an empty file. If you would like to add some text to the file, you can type in after this, like this:
